Hero.description: Split layout. Left: Bold Headline + Pulse CTA. Right: Full height image with subtle parallax.
Hero.instructions: Use 'Manrope' for the headline. The CTA button must have a 'ring' animation to simulate a pulse.

Products.description: A grid of cards. Some span 2 columns. Hover effects: Zoom image + Reveal text.
Products.instructions: Use CSS Grid. Make 'Revestimento' and 'Pedras' span 2 columns to break the monotony.

Gallery.description: Masonry layout of project images. Click to open in a Dialog (Shadcn).
Gallery.instructions: Use 'react-photo-album' or custom masonry. Use Shadcn Dialog for the lightbox view.

FloatingWhatsApp.description: Fixed bottom-right button. Green brand color (#25D366).
FloatingWhatsApp.instructions: Always visible. Z-index 50. Add a tooltip 'Fale Conosco'.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-slot class-variance-authority
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the primary color #F2811D and the 'Manrope' font family.
3. CREATE COMPONENTS: Build the sections as separate components in 'src/components'.
4. IMPLEMENT SEO: Add the JSON-LD script to the 'public/index.html' head or use a Helmet component.
5. ANIMATIONS: Apply 'framer-motion' to all sections. Use 'whileInView' for scroll triggering.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons and links (e.g., 'hero-cta-button', 'whatsapp-float-button').
7. DO NOT use generic gradients. Use white space and bold typography.
